check_box.name: mute_when_minimized
check_box.label: Mute audio when window is minimized

check_box.name: enable_attached_sounds
check_box.label: Other avatars' attachments sounds
check_box.tool_tip: Unchecking this box allows to mute all sounds coming from other avatars' attachments which are played via llPlaySound(). Note that this does not affect sounds played via llTriggerSound() since those are not flagged as attached to an object at all.

check_box.name: enable_gesture_sounds
check_box.label: Gesture sounds
check_box.tool_tip: Unchecking this box allows to mute all sounds coming from gestures.

check_box.name: enable_neighbor_sims_sounds
check_box.label: Neighbor sims sounds
check_box.tool_tip: Unchecking this box allows to mute all sounds coming from objects located in neighboring simulators.

slider.name: Wind level
slider.label: Wind audio level
slider.tool_tip: This is an additionnal audio level factor (multiplied to the Ambient sound factor) applied to the winds audio (both absolute and relative winds). Note that unlike Linden Lab's and most third party viewers, the Cool VL Viewer always plays wind audio when the camera is above water and whether the avatar is flying or not (other viewers disable wind audio when not flying).

button.name: mute_wind
button.tool_tip: You may entirely disable the wind audio with this button.

text.name: ui_sounds_text
text.tool_tip: The check boxes below allow you to enable and disable individual UI sounds.

text.name: ui_sounds_text
text.tool_tip: Minimum change in your money balance required to trigger a money earnt or money spent UI sound.

spinner.name: L$ Change Threshold
spinner.tool_tip: Minimum change in your money balance required to trigger a money earnt or money spent UI sound.

check_box.name: enable_UISndNewIncomingIMSessionEnable
check_box.label: Incoming IM session starting...
check_box.tool_tip: When enabled, a sound for incoming IM sessions will play when they start. This applies only to private (or conference) sessions, unless the setting on the right is also enabled, in which case the sound will also be played for group sessions.

check_box.name: enable_UISndNewIncomingPlayForGroup
check_box.tool_tip: When enabled, a sound for incoming group IM sessions will play when they start. If disabled, the new group sessions will not play a sound. BEWARE: due to how private sessions are detected, disabling this setting means that you will not get a sound played either for private IM sessions starting while you are in Admin mode.
check_box.label: ...play it also for group sessions

check_box.name: enable_UISndTypingEnable
check_box.tool_tip: Note: this is actually the same setting as the "Play the typing sound when an avatar types in chat" one, in the Text Chat preferences tab.
check_box.label: Avatars typing in chat

text.name: physics_sounds_text
text.tool_tip: The check boxes below allow you to enable and disable individual physics engine sounds.

spinner.name: Health Reduction Threshold
spinner.label: Health reduction threshold
spinner.tool_tip: Minimum reduction of your avatar's health (in percents) required to trigger the damages UI sound

check_box.name: enable_EnableCollisionSounds
check_box.label: Collision sounds
check_box.tool_tip: This is for the sounds resulting from collisions of avatars and physical objects with other objects or avatars.

check_box.name: enable_UISndHealthReductionFEnable
check_box.label: Damages: female pain
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, this is the sound played when your avatar endures health damages, while using a female shape or when the male pain sound is disabled.

check_box.name: enable_UISndHealthReductionMEnable
check_box.label: Damages: male pain
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, this is the sound played when your avatar endures health damages, while using a male shape or when the female pain sound is disabled.

check_box.name: media_enable_filter
check_box.label: Media and audio stream filtering
check_box.tool_tip: This setting entitles you to allow/deny/whitelist/blacklist the servers for media and parcel audio streams. When the viewer connects to a media or streaming server, your IP is exposed and some people might use it to try and track you and make assumptions about what your alt avatars could be.

check_box.name: media_lookup_ip
check_box.label: Lookup IP address for filtered domains
check_box.tool_tip: When checked, enables IP lookups on media domains. This allows to defeat domain name changes of fixed IP servers that you already banned under another domain name. It however incurs short 'freezes' (normally less than 1 second) on successful lookups (valid domains) and longer 'freezes' (up to around 10s) on failing lookups (invalid domain names, normally rare).

check_box.name: streaming_music
check_box.label: Play parcel streaming music when available

check_box.name: notify_stream_changes
check_box.label: Notify about streaming music title changes
check_box.tool_tip: When using FMOD as the audio driver, you may check this box to get notified about parcel music title changes. Note that the currently playing music title is also reported when available in the tool tip of the music controls icon, on the bottom right of the viewer window.

check_box.name: media_hud
check_box.label: Show the media HUD
check_box.tool_tip: When this setting is enabled and you hover the mouse pointer, or click on the face of an object bearing a playing media, the media HUD is shown. Note that, unlike parcel media, shared media may have permission restrictions that forbid the media HUD to show despite this setting.

text.name: text_box_zoom
text.tool_tip: When a new media face is selected (clicked), an auto-zooming on that face may occur, depending on the media configuration. You may override this behavior with this setting.

radio_item.tool_tip: With this setting checked, auto-zooming will happen depending on the media configuration.
With this setting checked, auto-zooming will never happen, whatever is the media configuration.
With this setting checked, auto-zooming will always happen, whatever is the media configuration.

check_box.name: shared_media
check_box.label: Play shared media (AKA 'media on a prim')

check_box.name: on_others
check_box.label: Play shared media on objects attached to other avatars

check_box.name: within_parcel
check_box.label: Play media located on the parcel where your avatar is standing

check_box.name: outside_parcel
check_box.label: Play media located outside the parcel your avatar is standing in
